basic.name: Lightning Fury (Q)
basic.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 158 damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 158 damage to enemies in their path. {highlight}Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.{/highlight}

basic.name: Blinding Light (W)
basic.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 50 damage and Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.Passive: Cassia deals 15% increased damage to Blinded targets.

basic.name: Fend (E)
basic.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving Channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 64 damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Avoidance remains charged while Channeling.

heroic.name: Ball Lightning (R)
heroic.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.

heroic.name: Valkyrie (R)
heroic.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

trait.name: Avoidance (T)
trait.description: While moving, Cassia gradually gains up to 30 Armor over 3 seconds. After being stationary for 0.75 seconds, the Armor is rapidly lost over .5 seconds. Avoidance remains charged while Fending.

1.name: Skovo's Pride
1.description: {highlight}Fend now stuns the target for 0.75 seconds. If the target health is below 35% Fend will deal additional damage 50% damage and grant Cassia protected while Channeling{/highlight}

1.name: Ring of Leech
1.description: {highlight}Fend heals 40% of the damage done the effect is double if the target is blinded.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight} Increase Fend area of effect by 25%{/highlight}

1.name: Valkyrie's Charge
1.description: {highlight}Increase Fend cast range by 70%. Cassia now travels through terrain while charging{/highlight}

4.name: Surge of Light
4.description: After taking 650 damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 220 damage to enemies around her.

4.name: Charged Strikes
4.description: Gain 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 20% bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes. {highlight}Each enemy hero hit reduces Cassia cooldowns by 0.3 seconds and restores 10 mana{/highlight}

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health over 5 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by 10 seconds.
passives: {highlight}Increase Lightning Fury damage by 25% while active{/highlight}

7.name: Zerae's boon
7.description: {highlight}After 0.75 a lightning javelin will struck the center of the affected area making enemey heroes disoriented for 1.5 seconds.{/highlight}

7.name: Seraph's Hymn
7.description: {highlight}Blinding Light persists on the area for 1.5 seconds extending any blind duration.{/highlight}
passives: Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from 15% to 30%

7.name: Plate of the Whale
7.description: {highlight}Blinding Light grants 20 shield for 3 seconds for every enemy hit this bonus is tripled if it's an hero up to 180.{/highlight}
passives: Regenerate 6 Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged gain an additional 12 Health per second.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Athulua's Fury
13.description: {highlight}Fend now knocks back enemies at the end of its channel slowing them for 30% for 2 seconds and deal extra 6% of his maximum health damage if he is blinded.{/highlight}

13.name: War Traveler
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.

13.name: Rockstopper
13.description: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to {highlight}40{/highlight} for 4 seconds. Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.

16.name: Power Strike
16.description: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Enemy Heroes hit reduce its cooldown by 1 second and become marked for 15 seconds. Upon reaching 3 marks, remove them and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.

16.name: Static Electricity
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.

16.name: Gloves of Alacrity
16.description: {highlight}Hitting enemy heroes with Lightning Fury empowers Cassia next basic attack with 3 extra range and extra 6% of their maximum health as damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for 5 seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor{highlight} and empowers the next Lightning Fury increasing its speed and max range by 30%.{/highlight}
